channel.title: paw on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in paw on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Jennie can go outside again
item.description: 11:01 Thursday 14 December 2017 JST Jennie went to the doctor today who said her paw had recovered enough to let her go outside. So great! I didn’t want to have to keep her inside for a week or whatever it was before. She’s quite persistent in explaining where she’d rather be!

item.title: cat paw
item.description: 13:59 Tuesday 12 December 2017 JST Giving Jennie some cuddles today, I noticed an extra pad on her foot. Hmmm. That’s not a pad, that’s a swollen something something. fortunately Lin still had time to take her to the clinic; I am headed to work now. Hopefully and presumably she will be okay!
